title: [Large-scale] Evidence-Based Workshop for Strengthening Nurses’ Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended environment utilizing digital devices, structured based on Gagné’s instructional design principles

learning_goals: Learners perform assertive communication techniques for patient safety with 80% accuracy within 4 weeks.
Learners propose at least three communication strategies for conflict scenarios via role-play simulations.
Learners achieve a communication self-efficacy scale score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
